section: RHTP FY23 awards list — Arkansas PACT award entry
claim_summary: U.S. DOJ OJJDP RHTP FY23 awards document lists a $3,099,792 award to Arkansas for the PACT program (referenced in-thread as NAMI Arkansas + DHS DAABHS involvement).

source.title: OJJDP RHTP FY23 Awards
source.issuing_body: U.S. Department of Justice — Office of Juvenile Justice and Delinquency Prevention (OJJDP)
